original_title: 賭場の牝猫 捨身の勝負
overview: Yukiko is on her way to meet Boss Gunji. Judging by her appearance, no one would suspect that this beautiful young woman, sitting quietly in a suburban train, is the only woman able to beat the best professional players in Japan; or that she is wearing the tattoo of the man that loved her and died for her...
title: Cat Girls Gamblers: Abandoned Fangs of Triumph
